name: TBWE (TheBestWebsiteEver)
overview:
TheBestWebsiteEver.com (also can be found as TBWE.com) is a revolutionary advertising and prize-winning experience where over 25% of profits go to various charities and environmental agencies. Home to 10,000+ brands and launched out of Wyckoff, NJ, the web network allows the world to decide who “The Best Evers” really are and displays live results for everyone to see, all the while guaranteeing that their users can and will win prizes simply for voting. With affordable advertising offered (only $1/day) and new voting categories constantly being created, TBWE is The Biggest Website Ever (TheBiggestWebsiteEver.com) as well, as it is their goal to hold the most advertising than anywhere else in the world.

TBWEâ€™s entire network revolves around TheBestCharityEver.com category where whichever charity receives the most votes each month wins a portion of TheBestWorldEver.com too) so whether you’re a voter or an advertiser, you can feel good about coming to the site every day. Since its launch in May of 2010, the profits. The vision is to help create The Best World Ever (thus TBWE is President and founder, Ray Maniaci of Wyckoff, has written checks to RisingStarOutreach.org and InclusionProject.org for receiving the most votes in the first four months.

Each category of TBWE has its own odds of winning and they automatically notify the brands you vote for when you win/vote for them and beat the odds. This gives advertisers the unique ability to reward their true fans (you) for voting for them with their very own prizes. At TBWE, you can vote for things you truly love, want, and enjoy, knowing there’s always a chance you will win something directly from them.

TBWE was built with the voter and advertiser in mind. Users can vote in over 200 categories, upload individual pictures, post comments, and watch their favorites move on the page in front of them with each vote they place. Advertisers who pay $365/year have their logos highlighted in gold, are linked to their own websites, and are notified immediately when TBWE users vote for them and beat the category odds. They can log in at any time during their yearly term to view valuable demographic information (age, country, state, zip code, gender, education level, income level and ethnicity) of all of their voters, while TBWE ensures us that their usersâ€™ personal contact information is never distributed unless it is for prize redemption purposes only.

If just 1,000 of TBWEâ€™s 10,000 brands would activate their logos and reward their fans, $100,000 would be raised for charity. Still, TBWEâ€™s goal is to have each and every advertiser, celebrities included, participate so millions will be donated. For more information: www.TBWE.com
